events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn’t fit at all. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to item size and customer dissatisfaction.
Assigning this refund request case to the returns department for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help process your refund request quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase to verify your refund eligibility?
Here is my order number 12345678 and I bought the jacket on May 25th. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I will send it back as soon as I receive the label.
We have processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thank you for the prompt support and smooth process!
Closing the case now as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer is satisfied.
